storyInfo: Greta realizes Lucian is not only focused on the film shoot, but also the things outside of it. She officially invites him to become the 'leading man', and to settle all that has transpired on the plate. His first step is to unmask the killer behind the serial murders—Moira.

attributes.content: A petite Zalak gropes around in the darkness as she traverses the pitch-black plate layer.
Hmm... I see how it is.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: The structure and systems look complex, but once you figure out the theory behind it...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Even a prop-maker can operate it.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: For example, here, adjust its direction first...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Then set a time, pull down the lever, open the gate, and...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Done.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Good, just like I thought.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: This way, I'll have nothing to worry about even if something unexpected happens.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Now, there's just one last thing to do...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I need to go find her.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: I'm sure you have reservations, Lucian.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: The plate's in a crisis, and everybody's in danger. I wouldn't trust a cold-hearted producer who is demanding the shoot go on either.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: We do not need to trust each other.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Heh. You're not wrong.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: In my twenty years in Wrankwood, I've never trusted a single person I've worked with. I trust only in my own judgment.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: I invited Melanie right when she most needed an opportunity. I saw right away at that auction that you were an acting genius. And I was sure Abner would join the crew even though he hates my guts.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: ...I even still believe that Laura's death five years ago was the only way to save that movie.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: You had nothing to do with the accident, but you still made use of her death.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: She was a talented rookie. Eager, hardworking, and full of passion for cinema. It's just that sometimes, that enthusiasm got to her head, and made her break a few rules.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Steven was still green back then, and the shoot wasn't going as planned. Halfway through the project, I knew that film would burn through all my assets and leave my reputation in tatters.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: I needed an 'external factor' to help me solve that crisis.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Laura's death.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Using the media to hype up the accident would be too predictable. Those busybodies would just sigh and forget all about it the moment they moved on.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: So I used a lot of money to squash the police investigation and media's attention, along with a healthy amount of hush money to Laura's family.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: I got the editor to keep the footage of the fall that Abner captured on camera, and turned it into the climax of the film.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Even now, there are some people who still think she was just an acting genius who retired early.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: You covered up her death.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: I immortalized her in film.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Someone will eventually notice what you did.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Every year, on the day of her sacrifice, I go visit her. Five years, and I'm the only one who brings flowers to her grave.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Do you not feel guilt?
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: I'm certainly to blame for it. But now's not the time for repentance.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Right now, there's only one thing on my mind: finishing this film.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Once The Death of Lady Dupont is screening, the murders on set are bound to get the media's attention. I'll take that chance to officially release the truth behind Laura's death.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: When that time comes, there will be a lot more people grieving for her. And that's when I'll bear the blame.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: I hope you realize that I didn't confess all that to you on a whim.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: You want to use the truth to make a deal.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: When I first met you, I thought it was fate throwing me a bone, dropping a big present on my lap before shooting started.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: But it was your behavior after you joined the crew that proved to me you are no ordinary man.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Dalton died right in front of you, but you kept your cool. You even looked forward to future filming.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: After you discovered my plans to film a Catastrophe, you took the perfect opportunity to leak those plans to the camera assistant most likely to spill them.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: And now with the crew officially dismissed, almost everyone is feeling desperate. Except you. You were waiting in your room for me to visit, as if you're no stranger to sudden death and tragedy.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Who are you exactly, and why did you agree to join my film crew?
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: I was enticed by your script. No more and no less.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: The way things are now, interrogating you about your history isn't going to help my shoot, but I was hoping you would repay my honesty in kind.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: I still believe in my vision, Lucian. No matter what I find out about you, no matter how suspicious, I will never withdraw my invitation for you to be my male lead.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: If you really can't explain why you're here, if you've got your sights on something way over my head...
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: If you think Laura's death and everything it's caused five years down the line are the real 'story' being filmed on this plate, and you're here for that...
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Then I, Greta Stone, would like to invite you again.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Please be our next 'leading man', Lucian.
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: If that is your wish... then it is mine as well, Madam Stone.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.text: '...Greta... sent out compensation to everyone and officially disbanded the crew.'
'Whether you're scared of the killer, worried about the Catastrophe, or want to stay and finish the shoot, we're all free to do as we please.'
Finish the shoot? Greta is still thinking about her movie right now?
She must have noticed the connection between the murders of the crew and the one five years ago.
So she's doing it on purpose...
'Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn, and I don't see why you should either.'
'Or, as Greta said, you can leave the truth to whoever feels like playing detective.'
The cast and crew both mercilessly bully newcomers. The producer even massaged a tragic and fatal fall into a scene that straddles the line between truth and lie.
If you will not repent for what happened five years ago, nor make your deeds known to the public...
Do you believe yourself innocent, Greta? Have you forgotten how you edited Laura into your film, all so she could die over and over again with every showing?

attributes.content: A bulge on the bed is faintly outlined by the dim nightlight. The person beneath the blanket is fast asleep, ignorant of the judgment about to fall upon her.
Fast asleep? That desecrator of the dead, forgetter of sins, ignorer of warnings... How could Greta sleep so soundly?
Someone quietly creeps closer to the bed, pulling a razor-sharp dagger out of a sleeve. Slender fingers grip its hilt tightly, lifting the terrifying weapon high into the air.
I don't even want to hear your confession! I don't even want to hear your screams! Just go away already! You must PAY!
This feeling... It's not right...
The blanket is lifted up. There is nobody under it, aside from a black shadow.
A shadow? How can a shadow exist on its own?
The intruder steps back a bit, as the shadow slowly condenses into a familiar shape.
...Miss.Christine?
A trap...
So we finally meet.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: I welcome you, my elusive guest.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Is it really... you?
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: Moira... The most dedicated member of the crew was actually a three-time murderer...
attributes.name: Greta

attributes.content: It should have been four.
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: When did you find out, Lucian?
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: The first to notice your abnormal behavior was Miss.Christine, not me.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: In that very first scene after I joined the cast, she intruded upon the shoot.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: She rarely approaches anyone other than me, but she approached you.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Since then, she has made contact with you many times.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Tippi believed she decided to accompany you as you watched movies in the prop room because she likes the both of you.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: That is only half correct.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Miss.Christine was only ever interested in you.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Look. Even now, even as you hold that dreadful dagger, she still stands by your side.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Ridiculous...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Don't tell me that's your only reason to suspect me? Just because this mysterious creature is fond of me?
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Or maybe she only does what you tell her to. She is your pet, after all...
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Moira looks into Miss.Christine's deep, blue eyes.
The very next moment, she no longer has conscious control over herself.
Joy, sorrow, anger. All sorts of emotions roil through her heart, before finally settling into a blank void, one that terrifies anyone looking upon it.
You continue to misunderstand her.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: As I have explained before, none may interfere with her intentions and actions.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: I did not merely mean that she is free-spirited by nature, but rather, nobody has the 'ability' to interfere with her.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: It is she who possesses the 'ability' to influence others.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: The mysterious black creature nonchalantly licks her paws.
Moira finds it difficult to reconcile the Miss.Christine she sees now with the enormous pressure she felt earlier.
Miss.Christine is extremely sensitive to emotions. No carefully buried pain or flicker of malice escapes her notice.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Over countless years, she has wandered across all of Terra, tasting the entire spectrum of feeling.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Rather than any particular flavor, she prefers a blend.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: And her judgment is derived from instinct rather than logic. It does not err.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Solving a murder without even discovering a motive. Should I congratulate you?
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: Vengeance.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: For who?
attributes.name: Moira

attributes.content: For that ghost entangled in the minds of the majority of the crew.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: Madam Stone, the one who stands before you now is a relative of that rookie actress Laura, who fell to her death five years ago.
attributes.name: Lucian

attributes.content: One who loved her dearly. Her little sister.
attributes.name: Lucian
